name: Oven-Baked Sweet Potato Chips with Honey Butter
author: bluegirlie
summary: Panko-breaded sweet potato slices! Crunchy on the outside, tender on the inside - so addictive!
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and sliced into 1/8-inch thick rounds
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Line a large rimmed baking sheet with foil and lightly coat with cooking spray
Mix panko, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a small bowl
Dip sweet potato slices in beaten egg, then coat with panko mixture
Place in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet
Spray tops of sweet potato slices lightly with cooking spray
Bake in the preheated oven until chips are golden brown and crunchy, about 20 minutes
Mix butter and honey together in a bowl in the meantime
